product_vision:
Project: Test E-commerce Platform v2
        Domain: ecommerce
        Description: Modern e-commerce platform with user story-focused architecture
        Vision Statement: Create a seamless online shopping experience
        Business Objectives: Increase sales, Improve user experience
        Target Audience: Online shoppers
        Success Metrics: Conversion rate improvement, User satisfaction scores
        Team Size: 5
        Timeline: 3 months

epics.title: Enhanced Product Discovery for Shoppers
epics.description: Enable online shoppers to easily find and explore products through intuitive search, filtering, and personalized recommendations. This epic focuses on reducing friction in the discovery process to drive engagement and sales.
epics.business_value: Increases conversion rate by 10% through improved product visibility and relevance
success_criteria: Search result relevance improved by 20% based on click-through rates
Personalized recommendations adopted by 30% of users within first month
risks: Potential delays in integrating third-party recommendation engines
User data privacy concerns with personalization

epics.title: Streamlined Checkout Process
epics.description: Simplify the checkout experience with a one-page flow, multiple payment options, and guest checkout functionality. This epic aims to reduce cart abandonment and improve user satisfaction by minimizing steps to purchase.
epics.business_value: Reduces cart abandonment rate by 15%, boosting sales
risks: Integration challenges with multiple payment providers

epics.title: User Account Management Portal
epics.description: Provide shoppers with a self-service portal to manage their profiles, track orders, and save preferences. This epic enhances user experience by offering convenience and transparency in account interactions.
epics.business_value: Improves user satisfaction scores by 20% through better account control
success_criteria: 80% of returning users utilize the portal for order tracking
User satisfaction score for account features exceeds 4/5
risks: Potential data security risks with stored user information
Low adoption if UI is not intuitive

epics.title: Mobile-First Responsive Design
epics.description: Develop a mobile-optimized interface to ensure a seamless shopping experience across devices. This epic addresses the growing number of mobile shoppers by prioritizing accessibility and usability on smaller screens.
epics.business_value: Increases mobile user conversion rate by 12% and captures 40% mobile traffic
success_criteria: Mobile transactions account for 30% of total sales
risks: Higher development time for cross-device testing

epics.title: Product Review and Rating System
epics.description: Implement a feature for users to leave reviews and ratings on products to build trust and inform purchasing decisions. This epic enhances credibility and engagement by incorporating user-generated content.
epics.business_value: Increases user trust, driving a 5% uplift in conversion rates
success_criteria: At least 20% of purchased products receive reviews within 3 months
Average product rating visible on 90% of listings
risks: Low user participation in leaving reviews

project_context.project_description: Modern e-commerce platform with user story-focused architecture
project_context.vision_statement: Create a seamless online shopping experience
